website_summaries.verdict: Great for everyday use, these durable, fisherman-style sandals can be dressed up or dressed down.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Durable, Runs Large
customer_reviews.text: These are classic, real leather durable and comfortable sandals. My son had s pair last summer that lasted throughout the year and he liked to wear them, saying that they were comfortable. We've bought another pair for this year. They're also pretty versatile in that they go with a lot of different outfits, both casual and dressier. They do run large--at least one size so try to account for that when you order. Otherwise, these are great real leather sandals that are worth the price since they're more comfortable and will last longer than cheap, synthetic versions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for balancing my 15month old little one leaves feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for balancing my 15month old little one leaves feet comfortable and breathable, solid support, soft insole and outer. Crocs were his first shoes but leave his feet sweaty and uncomfortable, striderite it is till he can choose his own - bought these in a 4.5 5,5 and 6 as they go with everything and check all the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Zainab Jabbar

customer_reviews.title: Aside from the sizing having erred on the side of ...
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the sizing having erred on the side of larger (1/2 size larger), appear to be the same quality of Stride Rite my family has relied on for the past 20+ years. Since all the stores in a 50+ mile radius from us have closed, no way to guarantee fit. Evidently there isn't a standard sizing model being used in the industry. So once my grandson grows into them, we will know more about the quality of the work.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great, quality sandals. They look great on my son and the only sandal that can accommodate is wide feet. The only problem is he says they hurt, the strap rubs against his feet and causes marks. They fit great and are doctor approved but I think it's the material. He wears socks with them so it's fine but I'd love for him to wear them without socks and pain.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O.

customer_reviews.title: Can't get sizing right
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand this brand! I order 6 and 6.5 first in several styles with wardrobe, which were way too small and I couldn't even tell the difference between them. So I returned them and ordered a size 7.5 which are absolutely HUGE. With the 6.5 there was no room at the toe and with the 7.5 there is at least an inch. I have ordered and returned so many times I am beyond frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but long and narrow for the size
customer_reviews.text: We have loved these sandals for years, because they are cute and comfortable for my boy with wide feet. This year, the Stride Rite store didn't have his size in stock, so we ordered from Amazon. He is wearing about an 11.5, or even 12 in tennis shoes, but these always tend to run large in length, and the 11.5 was too long, so we ordered an 11 W (wide width). When they came, they were so narrow I could barely squeeze them on him. We are sending them back and trying an XW. These sandals look great, but just be warned that they run long and narrow, even in the wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I ordered a 7.5 for my 2.5 yr old son. He wears Saucony size 7. They are a little big but nothing he can't handle. He hasn't tripped in them yet. They are sandals so my son did complain every single time a wood chip or sand got into his sandals, but it is very nice. He hasn't come home with smelly feet yet (some of the complaints I heard from parents of kids that own Keen sandals). Great traction too.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper:)

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE them! You can dress them up or down ...
customer_reviews.text: YAY!!! NO SMELLY FEET! I bought these sandals last year and purchased them again for my 3 yr old tot son. I LOVE them! You can dress them up or down and the BEST Part--NO STINKY FEET! They are soft and do not bruise ankles. They run large. My son wears a size 8 and I bought a size 8 and he has about 1/2 in. of extra room. I would not by a size up unless your child has really wide feet. Will be a repeat customer next summer also! Keep making them Stride Rite.
customer_reviews.author: wwynnie

customer_reviews.title: Good sole but runs large
customer_reviews.text: Our son is a size 8 1/2 M in stride rite sneakers. I ordered these in a size 9 figuring he would have a little room to grow in the summer (it is now the spring) They arrived and were humongous. I mean HUGE. I reordered them in both 8 and 8 1/2 and the 8 fit. They are nice quality leather and a soft cushioned rubber sole. My only other issue is the strap that goes behind the ankle is not adjustable. I wish it was because sometimes it allows the foot to go a little too far back. I would recommend but order it a half size smaller then your current size.
customer_reviews.author: Counselor4444

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I ordered 2.5 w and it fits my 3.5 shoe size kid. So yeah read the reviews before buy. I am so glad I did, and definitely the sandal is worth every penny of the buy. My son wears it as often as he can for school, and other activities.
customer_reviews.author: Diya

customer_reviews.title: Third time is a charm!
customer_reviews.text: So these sandals are great quality.... HOWEVER....it took me ordering three pairs to get the size right. Thank goodness for prime/free returns! My son normally wears a 2.5 (M) big kid size...it was way, way too long. So I reordered at 1.5 (M) big kid...it was way, way too narrow but the length was good. So then I reordered a 1.5 (W) big kid size and it fit just right! Whew, this Goldie locks is worn out from so many trips to the UPS store.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are fantastic...IF you can get the right size. I should have read the reviews first saying these sandals run large, however that was the least of my problems as the first pair I received were two completely different sizes! There was a toddler size 11 and a child size 1 in the box! Returned and ordered another pair - this time both shoes in the box were the same size but still very large. Returned for a third pair and finally had success! Thank goodness for free returns but still, I had to dock a couple stars for the hassle even though the shoes are great and comfy for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: WhatJaredSees

customer_reviews.title: We love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! So does my son. Super good for them to learn to put on their own shoes. They must be very comfy since he loves to wear them. What I love the most is that they go well with almost any outfit! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I have two small boys. I have now ordered these shoes two years in a row. They are amazing! If you buy them at the StrideRite store the exact same shoes are $60. My boys run around in these and they do not fall apart. They have a great sole and are sturdy. Also even though it's breathable on the sides, the top of their feet are protected which is a huge plus. These are by far the best shoes I have found!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson likes them very much. Great fit, great price and he'll grow out of them before he wears them out. Packaging and delivery time both good to go. Great shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Reinsmith

customer_reviews.title: Run Large!!
customer_reviews.text: We had to order a second pair since the original were waaaaaay too big! My son wears a 12-12.5 in tennis shoes so I ordered 12.5 in these sandals hoping for a little bit of extra room since they're sandals BUT they were GIANT!! I ordered an 11.5 on the 2nd pair and they fit great with plenty of extra room. It may not be till NEXT summer that he wears the 12.5. These are SUPER STURDY and playground proof which I love! I bought these to wear with dressier outfits but he asks to wear them to pre-k and since they hold up I have been letting him.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe but runs big
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old for Easter but they are definitely larger than I expected. He wears a 2 1/2 in tennis shoes and I ordered a 2 1/2. They seem about 1/2 to 1 size too big. We will be exchanging them soon. They are very nice looking and I love the leather.
customer_reviews.author: FNP mom

customer_reviews.title: My picky son loves these so much
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes, on our second pair. He wears them out completely but they seem to last. The little threads that stitch the shoe together get frayed after a while and look messy, but my son is really hard on his shoes. Definitely run big, get at least 1/2 size smaller than normal size.
customer_reviews.author: JennyO

customer_reviews.title: Classic Stride Rite...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for our child for summer. Price is great, same Stride Rite quality that we all love when it comes to SR shoes. The bottom has the black sole that comes up the front of the shoe ever so slightly to help prevent/saves your little ones toes when taking falls.
customer_reviews.author: PinkWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These fit very well. The soles are rubbery and grip very well. They also have good traction for toddlers on the run. The leather is very soft and bendable. Great shoe overall. I got them in extra wides and they were perfect for my wide footed toddler. I got them half a size up because I wanted them to fit my fast growing toddler for a while. The strap lets you have a wide range of widths so it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: GraBoston

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 15 month old and have never been disappointed until now
customer_reviews.text: I buy Stride Rite because they carry wide sizes for my 15 month old and have never been disappointed until now. I have bought 5W in previous designs and thought it would be perfect fit with this one, it was too tight. The third row of strands were so tight on his little feet that I ended up cutting them out with scissors. They fit ok now, but lost a little on the stability side.
customer_reviews.author: A&P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Quality amazing, style perfect. Good traction. Works for my little one who has flat feet and is very unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stride Rite makes good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Stride Rite makes good shoes. I bought a half size bigger, and they don't fall off. My little guy actually said comfy when I put them on him. I bought a pair of cheap yard shoes. I kept having to put them on because they would just slip off. I'll stick with Stide Rite from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old son has thick, wide feet and we usually buy Stride Rite wides, but I purchased these in XW to be safe and I'd say they are narrower than the "regular" (M) in any brand! So disappointed- couldn't even get his foot halfway into the sandal. Not recommended for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: OT Mom

customer_reviews.title: I recommend them to everyone
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very durable. I buy a pair for my kids (2 and 4) every summer. They wear them nearly every day during the summer and much of the spring and fall as well. They get lots of comments from family and friends. I recommend them to everyone. The only place we don’t wear them is a water park.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great extra wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: We have an extra wide toddler foot to deal with. We keep buying these because they are so comfortable, supportive, and easy to walk in. He always reaches for these shoes if he gets to pick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only good news is it's the only sandal that doesn't make ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs large. Size down. Already unraveling by the velcro, which happened with the last stride rite shoe as well. Cheaply made. Not the same quality of yester-year's stride rite. The only good news is it's the only sandal that doesn't make my son's feet stink.
customer_reviews.author: Clutterheart

customer_reviews.title: great sandals
customer_reviews.text: These were all really great purchase. Son has been wearing them all summer. They go with almost every outfit. He says they're comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Inna Grinberg

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler sandals
customer_reviews.text: My son has chubby wide feet and its not easy to find shoes for him. I was excited when these arrived. They were sized correctly, so I am not sure what other reviewers are talking about. I was glad I didn't order a size smaller as suggested. The wide is not too wide, just slightly wider than regular size. They are super cute and he seems to be comfortable in them. I would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No stinky feet at all!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are kind of ugly looking but they serve their purpose. It protects its toes. And it’s actually surprise that my 4 yr old son wears them without socks and any foot powder of any kind and his feet don’t stink at all. That’s a first for him. Very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco perez

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off now.
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these shoes for my son, recently I tried to replace the ones he had outgrown but even the Wide size was too narrow. We'd been buying these in wide for years, there's not much of a difference between the regular and wide, the sole might be a little wider but the top is too tight.
customer_reviews.author: bevperu

customer_reviews.title: Until Next Year!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes every year. My nephew adores them! Perfect for the summer! You can use them for a nice play date with khakis and a button down and also for a trip to the park! They run a little big, but that come in handy with the constant growing boy. Veristile and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Latrice James

customer_reviews.title: I've been searching for nice comfortable shoes for my toddler for a while now
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for nice comfortable shoes for my toddler for a while now. He has a tall arch and wide feet, so it makes it extra difficult to find something comfortable. I was excited to finally find these and ordered the XW :)! However, it runs to large so I have to return the size 7.5 I ordered (we got his feet measured and I usually get a size 8) and get a smaller size. The 7.5 seems more like a 8.5/9.
customer_reviews.author: D Ny

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoes, but even taking into account that others said they ran big, we were surprised at how big. They are at least one full size larger than expected. Because he needed them for a school play, we kept them, and maybe he'll be into them by next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry K. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: After receiving this sandal, I wished it had adjusting ...
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this sandal, I wished it had adjusting straps to allow for more width since it was tight on my toddler's foot. This shoe was a wide width so I was surprised it was such a snug fit leaving red splotches on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes for my little boy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for my little boy. They can get wet and don't harden too much. They look so cute on him and he can run super fast and jump 40 miles, or so he says. They will get dirt, bark, and stickers in them if he walks in said landscapes.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Scharffenberg

customer_reviews.title: These are a very good shoe for your little one
customer_reviews.text: These are a very good shoe for your little one! I bought them for my toddler who is always climbing and running. They are great because they have great arch support, memory foam cushion, and the toes are covered so they can't scrape them. He likes wearing them and the velcro does not come undone as he is running around and playing on the playground. Great purchase and great asset to your spring/summer purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E Huseby

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes for my son
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes for my son! We bought them at Stride Rite when he was very little, but since then have been buying them on amazon each year. They are very rugged, nice looking and fit great! I love that he can wear them everyday with shorts and a tee, but then they can also get a little nicer with a polo or button down as well. He loves the fit of them, and they really hold together. When we are done with them we hand them down to a friend. I believe they are now on their 3rd or 4th toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sandals that your kiddo will love.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sandals that your kiddo will love. The velcro lines up great and they look to be very comfortable. My son loves them, that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Pete H.

customer_reviews.title: These are cute and seem to be good quality. My son has very high insteps and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and seem to be good quality. My son has very high insteps and these are wide enough for him in XW size. The strap around the back is slightly shorter than it needs to be and makes the shoe fit tighter than it needs to, that is my only issue. I would buy them again but if you are on the fence between 2 sizes, go with the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made sandal
customer_reviews.text: My three year old was upset that he outgrew his pair from last summer so I had to get him another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: shoe is longer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I went to the store and they measured my sons shoe size. I ordered based on their size recommendation but they are toe large for him. This shoe does come larger than normal. The shoe itself is really nice but I need to wait until he grows into them. I had to order online since my son is a big boy and usually his shoes are special order. I got a 9 extra wide. I gave it a 5 star because i like the sandal despite it being larger than expected
customer_reviews.author: auggie hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for our grandson who has narrow feet. These sandals have different widths to choose from. He LOVED them! Wore them out and now I'm ordering a new pair for him. They are very durable sandals with what appears to be a good fit. We were all very pleased with the fit, durability and quality of these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: I have bought the same exact brand and style of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the same exact brand and style of shoe fro four years straight. They are worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals for Wobbly Tots!
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2 1/2 year old's favorite shoes. They've been perfect for the summer, with the protection of a closed toe and cool enough to keep his little feet from sweating. They can be worn with almost any outfit, hold up with daily wear/play/abuse & keep help keep him stable on his feet. I don't know what we'd do without Stride Rite!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Owens

customer_reviews.title: They seem very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: We were having a nightmare finding shoes that fit a very chubby foot. I got these in XW and they were a lifesaver! My toddler lived in these shoes all summer and still wears them when it's warm out or indoors. They can take a beating. They seem very comfortable and durable. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great dressy casual, easy on sandal.
customer_reviews.text: My child has xtra wide feet and these regular wide shoes fit wonderfully. Nice for church, easy on and off. Great dressy casual summer sandal. This is our second year with this style, and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Each Shoe is a Different Color
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes BUT they are different color, so one is a darker brown and the other looks like a tanish greys. I needed them for vacation so didn’t have time to exchange them. But it is noticeable. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The lining is not leather as I thought was described in the description. The seem to be good quality. They seem to run a full size big when I compare them to our other shoes and sandals.
customer_reviews.author: MommyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year. My son wears them everyday and is not exactly easy on them. They hold up great and we have not had any stinky shoe/feet problems.
customer_reviews.author: KRH

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these sandals. These are the 2nd pair we've gotten for our little guy and will continue to get them again next summer. Very durable. Our little guy is pretty active and these lasted 2 summers! He absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Bought them in two sizes so we could grow into the bigger ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, order 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe but c'mon Stride Rite.. Get the Size Rite! They're about a full size off in this style.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: my son loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish StrideRite would make this sandal in bigger sizes, too. It is so hard to find quality shoes in wide width, and this sandal lasted the whole summer, my son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect and i will continue to buy every summer
customer_reviews.text: this is the second pair i have bought! My son loves them. im not exaggerating when i say that i have bought about 15 sandals and none seem to fit my sons chubby wide little feet. These are perfect and i will continue to buy every summer !
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: and they are easily 2" too long
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing the size 11 sandals for two summers, but his big toe was starting to poke out the end, so I ordered the size 12, and they were so small his toes wouldn't even go in. So, I ordered the size 1, and they are easily 2" too long. Saving them for next summer and just dealing with the big toe situation...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the Velcro could be a little better done but i bought the next bigger size then ...
customer_reviews.text: the Velcro could be a little better done but i bought the next bigger size then what my son wears normally and they fit great,look great and he loves wearing them leather is soft and i'm a fan thanks stride ride
customer_reviews.author: Charly F.

customer_reviews.title: but to church or dinner and they work great.
customer_reviews.text: My son has a problem with shoes rubbing him the wrong way, so he can't wear these all day or for a lot of walking, but to church or dinner and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna S. Beres

customer_reviews.title: Foam, not pumice.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a pumice stone. It's a brick of styrofoam. Little purple pieces fly off it the whole time you are using it. I'm sure the product details probably tell you it's made of foam, but the name itself is deceptive enough that I didn't think I needed to verify the material.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our toddler after seeing how his older cousin has some and they have held up so well. Price is just great and I know they will last through both of my boys. Width is great for my wide foot toddler. Definitely would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: The leather has a distressed finish, which I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather has a distressed finish, which I didn't expect. I ordered a 7.5 (my son wears a 7 in nikes) I should have ordered a 6.5. Definitely order a size down. I'll keep and wait till he can wear them.
customer_reviews.author: KieraB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these sandals for the many years. They are great. My boys love them and can go wearing them all day long. They are easy to dry, if they do get wet. Thus they are easy to clean. And, provide toe coverage.
customer_reviews.author: DNA Grand

customer_reviews.title: STINKS
customer_reviews.text: This are nice when new, but soon enough they will stink so bad that you cant even be in the same room where the sandals are
customer_reviews.author: Var

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my little girl needed
customer_reviews.text: Love stride rite. These keep my toddler from falling down in the foothills where we live. The wide options are necessary for her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best kids sandal ever
customer_reviews.text: Best kids sandal. Sizes are weird. But figure it out. No smell because leather. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elise D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Good price and durable. Comfortable would highly recommend. I absolutely love these sandals. They protect my sons feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Order a full size down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes in a 2W for my son. They were HUGE! They fit his older brother, who wears a 3M, perfectly. His brother liked them okay, but not enough to want to keep them, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. They are very comfortable our son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and wears them for 12 hours a day while at daycare. Definitely impressed by the cost and the durability. The only thing is that the leather/faux leather stains really easily so it's hard to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Ebersole

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: We order this shoe for our son every year. It's one of the few children's shoes (and especially sandal) that actually offer wide sizes. Material is good and does not leave blisters
customer_reviews.author: cartersb25

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals. I get them for my son every ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals. I get them for my son every summer. I like them because they are easy for him to put on and off and the front covering of the toes is very helpful for an energetic and, sometimes clumsy, little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Roksolana

customer_reviews.title: I bought extra wide and I still couldn't get my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought extra wide and I still couldn't get my grandson's foot into them. They are quality sandals and very good-looking, but entirely too narrow for my 6 year old. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: EYG

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these for my 4 year old son. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 4 year old son. My son hasn't complained about discomfort. No blisters. They appear well built. although they are a little lighter brown than I had expected. I suppose you could darken them up with brown shoe polish if that was really important yo you.
customer_reviews.author: Lcm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sandals for my 6y/o son
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sandals for my 6y/o son. Ran a tad narrower than I expected (they were size Wide but they were a tad more narrow than the regular-width fisherman sandals I bought from Payless in the same size for my other son).
customer_reviews.author: TeamMed

customer_reviews.title: Longer in length than expected but overall excellent quality and style
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I expected in the length of the shoe but it is a great quality shoe and I'd rather it be too big than too small for my son. He can always grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: For Slim Feet Only...
customer_reviews.text: Even with wide, the depth of these shoes are very narrow and didn't fit my son. He doesn't have high arches and the shoes were just not a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jschossow819

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Love stride rite these sandals are well made my 3 year old loves them and they fit well
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Turner

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers are not kidding when they say they run big. I bought the size 12 for my son, who wears size 12 Stride Rite sneakers, and these are about 1inch too long. Actually, they fit his big sister, who wears a size 2. Of course, he will grow into them, so I'm not going to return them. Other than the size issue, they are cute and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: JBHK

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise my boy like it so much
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately velcro (sticking part) had to replace after two months. Otherwise my boy like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: alex rubel

customer_reviews.title: Great leather sandals for the summer, but they run large so order a half size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Our son wears size 11 (PUMA Suede Classic 2-Strap Sneaker) and I ordered size 10.5 sandals. These sandals run large so you should order a half size smaller. They look very comfortable and sturdy. My son has not been complaining and seems very happy to wear them and run!
customer_reviews.author: Monk Fan

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals as they offer good toe protection but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals as they offer good toe protection but still let the foot be cool. No odor from sweaty feet. Just order a size smaller than your kids' size. They run large.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Arenas

customer_reviews.title: Order at least a size down
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute but run large. I measured my sons before ordering and went a half size down based on reviews. Even then they are way too big. Other than that the sole feels very flexible and cushy.
customer_reviews.author: Guli

customer_reviews.title: Casual, cute but run large
customer_reviews.text: Adorable shoes that look more casual but yet are fun and protective to run in. As I have read in other reviews, these do run huge. I would almost say it's as if they should be a 9.5 or 10 instead of the nine wide I bought. Although they are big length-wise they fit his wide feet perfectly. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nightbreaker

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice pair of quality kids sandals at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Ellish

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting that this leather sandal will be durable. Now two months into wearing it, the fabric of the insole is totally broken, and not wearable any more. I am disappointed about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, great quality. My son knows these are his "church sandals" :)
customer_reviews.author: Colleen McGill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how sturdy this shoe is. The top leather is soft and the bottom bends a little but is rugged enough for lots of outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Boy Mom3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and would be even nicer if they would have other colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a charm and lasted all summer long and will easily be passed down to younger brother
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: These shoes run a bit large- for comparison, my ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run a bit large- for comparison, my son's classic crocs in size 4/5 are smaller than these shoes in a size 4.5. The width is just right. The back strap has a cushion in it so there is no irritation. He wears them all day with no complaints. They go with just about everything and are durable for playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: these run about a half a size too big. ...
customer_reviews.text: these run about a half a size too big. my son is in a 7.5 but i had to get the 7 to fit... and those still have a LOT of room to grow. These will definitely last him the whole summer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D. Cullinan

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe runs big
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews because these do definitely run big. My son wears an 8 1/2 now, but in these I purchased an eight and they fit perfectly- no growing room. He is a narrow foot and these are definitely not too wide. I bought the regular width.
customer_reviews.author: CVGmom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Really nice Sandal-first pair my son put on that he didn't cry in when he tried to walk and I believe it's due to the sturdiness-very sturdy and my son felt secure as he walked. I ordered a 5.5 regular width and it fit my 16 month old son with 1/2 inch room for growth. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Monopoli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect boy’s sandals. They protect the feet and are cool in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Wenger

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: Very rugged, should hold up to my 5 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are way, way off
customer_reviews.text: These are enormous. I ordered a size 9.5; when they arrived, I held them up to a pair of 10.5 sandals we had lying around, and the 9.5 was much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: K Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for wide width
customer_reviews.text: My son has wide feet and he is comfortable in these wide width sandals. We have gotten them 2 summers in a row now.
customer_reviews.author: Tara in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed in how these fit my little guy
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in how these fit my little guy. They are huge on him and his stride rite sneakers are the same size I ordered. His sneakers fit him perfect but these sandals are huge.
customer_reviews.author: Tbausch

customer_reviews.title: My Toddler Loves These Sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's go to sandals. He loves it and I love the fact that it doesn't make his feet smell like his other sandals. Every kid is different, but for my son, these sandals fit him perfectly, exactly his size.
customer_reviews.author: G. Laqui

customer_reviews.title: the material is great but the size is a bit off
customer_reviews.text: the material is great but the size is a bit off. we bought it for my son last summer but it took him entire year to grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Hudsen Fisherman Sandal (Toddler/Little Kid)
product_meta.description:
The Stride Rite Hudsen is a leather sandal that can be worn for every occasion.

Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.
feature_bullets: Fisherman sandal featuring rugged sole and adjustable hook-and-loop strap with logo stamp
